knimeNode.name: Sum/Min/Max
knimeNode.shortDescription: Compute the sum/mean/mean/max of several numeric columns

fullDescription.intro:
This node computes the sum/mean/mean/max of several numeric columns
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: the prefix for the new columns

ports.inPort: A table containing some numeric data
ports.outPort: Appends the sum/mean/mean/max to the input table
